comment: He's laid back, not the best teacher in the beginning, but I could see he was attempting to get better at teaching as we progressed in class! The only reason I toke him because he was the only one available! If you take him, make sure you work hard outside of class!
Not a HORRIBLE teacher. Like any econ class, you are required to study. If I had studied more for the 3 tests prior to the final exam, I would have at least made a B.        -mf

I took him because of his slightly impressive day job and thought that would correlate to his teaching, but boy was I WRONG! AVOID HIM! Little organization, simply reads off slides, does not provide additional help sessions nor makes you feel like you can ask him a question. Had to learn everything on my own. Note: do not need to buy book
Very laid back teacher. Gives very straight out of the book tests and hardly any homework. Very easy A if your an independent learner and can comprehend the text.
Worst teacher I have ever had. Kennesaw State if you actually want to grow as a school please get rid of the teachers that don't actually care about the grades their students received.

Awful, this man was nothing but useless. He would confuse himself while going over the material and never answered a question helpfully. All of the information he goes over is on a powerpoint so going to class is useless. The man is borderline incompetent
